item.title: 📜 Wiseilvaneom0/Solana-bot (278 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: Wiseilvaneom0

📝 Repository: Wiseilvaneom0/Solana-bot

📄 Descrizione: 🌫 Smart Solana MEV.. bot — runs in-browser or locally. Instantly analyzes transactions, snags profitable trades on Pump.FUN, Jupiter, and Raydium. Fully automated, lightning-fast, and tuned for top results.
